td.div: English: this is the flag of the Soviet Union in 1936. It was later replaced by File:Flag of the Soviet Union (1955-1980).svg.

tr.td: created by rotemliss from Image:Flag of the Soviet Union.svg.

dl.dd:
You are free:
to share – to copy, distribute and transmit the work
to remix – to adapt the work

Under the following conditions:
attribution – You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa;

tr.td:
Legal disclaimer
This image is or contains a symbol or symbols prohibited by law in the nations mentioned below, due to (variously) representations of communism, socialism, or similar governmental structures; or of parties/organizations associated with said:
Ukraine's Verkhovna Rada (article 436-1 of the Criminal code of Ukraine)
Georgia's parliament
Hungary: Act C of 2012 on the Criminal Code, Section 335
Latvia's Saeima
Lithuania's Constitutional Court passed Article 18818 of the Code of Administrative Offences
Germany's Criminal Code §86a, referring to the "use of symbols of unconstitutional organizations" outside the contexts of "art or science, research or teaching"
Indonesia's People's Consultative Assembly
Bans no longer in effect include:
Moldova: LPC192/2012ro,ru
Poland: Art. 256 of the Dz.U. 1997 nr 88 poz. 553 of the criminal code has removed references to imagery and now only covers promotion of communist ideas
Imagery covered may include the hammer and sickleen, red star, emblems/insignias, flags or images of leaders.

div.div:
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time. (newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)
Date/TimeThumbnailDimensionsUserComment
current13:02, 1 October 20201,000 × 500 (2 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Minor fix for path imperfection at the "sickle" grip/handle. Re-optimized svg code before upload.
16:59, 30 September 20201,000 × 500 (2 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)OK, fixed png preview and keep previous corrections (fixed slight path imperfections in the "sickle" grip/handle; simplified "star": applied yellow stroke to red star and eliminated the yellow star; centered the "star" relative to the "hammer and sickle": in previous version slight on the right; re-optimized svg code before upload). No other changes.
15:25, 30 September 20201,000 × 500 (1 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 19:56, 27 September 2020 (UTC): incorrect png preview for the star.
15:23, 30 September 20201,000 × 500 (1 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Fixed slight path imperfections in the "sickle" grip/handle. Simplified "star": applied yellow stroke to red star and eliminated the yellow star. Centered the "star" relative to the "hammer and sickle": in previous version slight on the right. Re-optimized svg code before upload. No other changes.
19:56, 27 September 20201,000 × 500 (1 KB)FDRMRZUSA (talk | contribs)Increased nominal dimensions. Optimized svg code with code cleanup and reduction. No other changes.
22:39, 26 June 2018600 × 300 (1 KB)Loic26 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 13:38, 10 May 2018 (UTC)
14:05, 17 June 2018600 × 300 (3 KB)JoaoPedro10029 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 04:08, 30 April 2018 (UTC)
13:38, 10 May 2018600 × 300 (1 KB)Loic26 (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 01:07, 30 November 2017 (UTC) https://www.marxists.org/history/ussr/government/1928/sufds/pictures/flag.jpg https://meshok.net/item/28749159_%D0%90%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BC_%D1%84%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B2_%D0%B8_%D0%B2%D1%8B%D0%BC%D0%BF%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2_1925
04:08, 30 April 2018600 × 300 (3 KB)RSFSR-USSR (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 14:49, 31 October 2017 (UTC)
01:07, 30 November 2017600 × 300 (1 KB)Sammimack (talk | contribs)Reverted to version as of 16:09, 6 November 2017 (UTC) Would you like to source that hammer & sickle?
(newest | oldest) View (newer 10 | older 10) (10 | 20 | 50 | 100 | 250 | 500)

div.p: View more global usage of this file.

This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
